dk.pervasive.jcaf
Interface ContextService

All Superinterfaces:
ContextClientHandler, EntityListenerHandler, PeerHandler, java.rmi.Remote, TransformerRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextServiceImpl
public interface ContextService
extends PeerHandler, TransformerRepository, ContextClientHandler, EntityListenerHandler

This interface defines a Context Service. This is the remote interface which becomes accessible when the Context Service is looked up in the RMI Registry.

Author:
Jakob Bardram

addContextItem

void addContextItem(java.lang.String entity_id,
                    Relationship relation,
                    ContextItem item)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Adds a ContextItem object with the specified Relationship to the entity's context. The relationship is the key to the context item. If this relationship already exists it is replaced.

Parameters:
entity_id - the id of the entity.
item - the ContextItem to add
relation - the relationship between the context item and the context
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
See Also:
Relationship
